name: Sleazy Paparazzi
description: The setting is the 21st century, a large venue in France based on the Palais des Festivals (Palais des Festivals et des Congrès de Cannes). You play as a time manipulation paparazzi tasked with taking pictures of celebrities on the red carpet, and you have 5 minutes of camera life to do so before it closes. The player will also have to avoid being apprehended by security guards utilising the game’s time mechanic.
